snippet.title: A Game of Thrones: The Board Game - Digital Edition — Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Preorder A Game of Thrones: The Board Game - Digital Edition before October 06 and get 20% off!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1075190/

A Game of Thrones: The Board Game – Digital Edition is the digital adaptation of the top-selling strategy board game from Fantasy Flight Games. During the game, players spread their influence across Westeros through a combination of strategic planning, masterful diplomacy, and military might. As one of the Great Houses, will you conquer with force, forge alliances, rally your townsfolk, or cunningly coerce your way to the Iron Throne?

Join the A Game of Thrones: The Board Game - Digital Edition Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/AGoTBGDigital/

Asmodee Digital's social channels can be found below:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AsmodeeDigital
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/AsmodeeDigital
Twitter: https://twitter.com/AsmodeeDigital
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/asmodeedigital
